content:
For the Datasets (Data Management) screen, the columns in the dataset list could include:

* Dataset Name: The name of the dataset, as assigned by the DS when uploading it.
* Upload Date: The date on which the dataset was uploaded to the system.
* Status: The current status of the dataset, which could be "Pending Review", "Approved", or "Rejected".

For the Tasks (Admin, Tagger, Checker View) screen, the columns in the task list could include:

* Task Name: The name of the task, as assigned by the Admin when creating it.
* Assigned User: The name of the Tagger user who has been assigned to work on the task.
* Status: The current status of the task, which could be "In Progress", "Complete", or "Rejected".
